internationalExperience.description: While working for Oowlish, I helped with the creation of the 2.0 version of Vetpoint, a web-based-application. I contributed building react themes, layouts and components, doing design auditions, prototyping animations and microinteractions.

history.description: At Oowlish I worked offshore with a team based in the United States to build the best possible interaction for our customers and partners.
Working in Fortes I built high fidelity prototypes which I used in user tests, gathered data and wrote documentation for auditions of the current system UI.
Researched, 3D designed, prototyped, and tested several iterations of a mobile charging totem, currently in use at the university
